NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: Please enable JavaScript to setup the integration.
UPDATE_INFO: This page will update as the integration progresses.
SYNC_INFO: After this is done we'll keep your comments in sync with your site so if you ever deactivate FastComments you won't lose any data.
LOGS_INFO: These logs will be kept for two years.
DESC_WAITING_FOR_CONNECTION: We are waiting for a connection from the plugin. Please keep this window and the plugin window open. Keep the WordPress admin tab open, not hidden, otherwise the sync will be slow.
DESC_TOKEN_CREATED: We created the integration token, and it's awaiting automatic validation.
DESC_TOKEN_VALIDATED: The integration has been successfully setup. Next we will start the data sync if required.
DESC_REQUESTED_SEND_COMMENTS: We're waiting for the integration to automatically send your comments. This page will update as the data is received. Please keep the plugin's setup page open. Switching to the WordPress page momentarily will actually make it faster!
DESC_ADDED_DOMAIN_ACCOUNT: We added the domain [domain] to your account.
DESC_MIGRATED_WP_DOMAIN_ACCOUNT: We migrated the WordPress integration for the domain [domain] in your account.
DESC_COMMENTS_RECEIVED: We received [countReceived] comments. There are [countRemaining] remaining to sync.
DESC_API_SECRET_REQUESTED: Your integration requested your API Secret Key. This is most likely for setting up SSO.
DESC_FETCH_EVENTS: The integration requested the event log for the latest comments and related data.
